name: 星之守护者 第二季
description: 资深星之守护者阿狸和厄运小姐突然重新出现在瓦罗兰城。她们的前一支小队已在一场未知事件中被摧毁，而她们正是来此重建团队。为了打破每一位已宣誓的星之守护者的宿命，她们在虚空野兽降临这座城市时与拉克丝等人一起加入战斗。

skins.name: 星之守护者 索拉卡

wikiSkinData.lore: A gentle soul with a mysterious origin among the stars, Soraka protects her team from behind the frontlines. Despite her shy appearance, she carries immense healing power and an unprecedented command of the Starlight, more than any other Star Guardian her team has encountered.

skins.name: 睡衣守护者 索拉卡

wikiSkinData.lore: The other girls (and Ezreal) seemed excited for the pillow fights, and staying up all night talking. Soraka was most excited for the cinnamon rolls she brought from Pantheon's Pastries. But nothing makes her happier than seeing her friends smiling and laughing.

skins.name: 至臻 星之守护者 索拉卡

wikiSkinData.lore: Leaving the planet behind with Xayah and the other Star Guardians, Soraka's full powers have been unlocked by her undying love for her friends—in the hopes that one day they will find their companion lost in the final battle with the Twilight Star, and be a family once again.

skins.name: 星之守护者 厄运小姐

wikiSkinData.lore: Second in command to Ahri, Miss Fortune is a hot-headed Star Guardian gunslinger from the galactic rim. She is the first to charge into battle with her twin pistols, often ignoring her own safety as long as she can take down every enemy in sight.

skins.name: 睡衣守护者 厄运小姐

wikiSkinData.lore: Sarah Fortune does not usually attend slumber parties. Nor wear fluffy pajamas. Nor play Truth or Dare. But Lulu insisted, and Lux asked so nicely, so somehow Sarah found herself doing all three. At least her pajamas came with holsters—juuust in case some cosmic enemies show up. You never know. It could happen.

skins.name: 星之守护者 伊泽瑞尔

wikiSkinData.lore: With a boundless curiosity about the universe, Ezreal is a born explorer, and becoming a Star Guardian only served to fuel his appetite for discovery. Though known to wander off, he always returns when most needed, especially now, as a certain pink-haired Guardian from another team has caught his attention…

skins.name: 睡衣守护者 伊泽瑞尔

wikiSkinData.lore: The First Star has burdened Ezreal with a lot. The responsibility. The hefty weight of destiny. The sparkly outfit (he's used to it). “Attending a slumber party” was definitely not on the list of expected cosmic duties. Not that he minds, really… as long as they don't actually try to braid his hair.

Ahri is a charismatic team captain who leads her group of Star Guardians from the outer cosmos, with the authority of a queen bee and the sly cunning of a fox. She's effortlessly popular, with an irresistible charm that disarms friends and foes alike.

skins.name: 星之守护者 辛德拉

wikiSkinData.lore: Feared and admired, Syndra is a formidable Star Guardian from an earlier era, whose history is cloaked in shadow. She acts as an advisor on Ahri's team, but despite her captain's trust, some members suspect there is no price that Syndra won't pay to achieve her personal ambitions.
